texts: How do you perform network scanning with Zenmap?

Learn network scanning techniques using Zenmap. This course covers the basics of scanning networks to identify vulnerabilities, port scanning, and interpreting scan results. Duration: 50 mins. Learners: 2316. Available in SB4A since 02 Mar 2023.

What common vulnerabilities affect account security?
Focuses on securing user accounts and authentication mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access. Duration: 30 mins. Learners: 5. Available in SB4A since 15 Sep 2023.
What are the key network defense strategies covered in IBM Security Learning Academy?

This course covers the fundamentals of cybersecurity, with an emphasis on network defense, threat detection, and incident response. Duration: 2 hrs 15 mins. Learners: 1069. Available in SB4A since 02 Mar 2022.
